body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Randy Rivera, and I represent Horizon Hotels. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amy. We take privacy very seriously at Horizon Hotels. Can you please provide me with the first four digits of your phone number and the last three digits of your credit card number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the first four digits of my phone number are nine eight one zero, and the last three digits of my credit card number are three three two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amy, for the information. For security reasons, could you also share the first three digits of your home address and the last digit of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the first three digits of my address are four four five, and the last digit of my social security number is six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for providing that information, Amy. Your privacy is important to us. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit sad because of a recent privacy concern at the hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how important privacy is, Amy. We will address your concern promptly. Thank you for reaching out. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us anytime. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help. Goodbye.
